plot: The actor's life is full of rejection, but nothing can dissuade Becky and Barry from their dream of Hollywood. With a mix of endearing naivety and tenacity, they might just make it.
plot_en: The actor's life is full of rejection, but nothing can dissuade Becky and Barry from their dream of Hollywood. With a mix of endearing naivety and tenacity, they might just make it.

title: Becky & Barry: The Series
